clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy of Huaiqihuang Granule in Children With Primary Nephrotic Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Real-world Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Huaiqihuang Granule in Children With Primary Nephrotic Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multisite, open-label, prospective and registered study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Huai-Qi-Huang granule in children with primary nephrotic syndrome.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multisite, open-label, prospective and registered study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Huai-Qi-Huang granule in children with primary nephrotic syndrome（PNS）. The study will be Planned at 1500 participants , and subjects will be on study for up to one year. Data will collected by authorized hysicians for 48 weeks. all of data included demographic characteristics, information about PNS,laboratory tests and adverse Events.

primary_outcome.measure: Duration of positive urine protein test changing to negative result
primary_outcome.time_frame: Duration of positive urine protein test changing to negative result was measured from day 1 until time of positive urine protein test changing to negative, assessed up to 48 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: The ratio of negative to positive urine protein
The decrease of 24-hour urine protein level

secondary_outcome.measure: Rates of infectious complications of PNS

study_pop.textblock: Children are diagnosed with primary nephrotic syndrome
